titleStmt.title: Three pastoral elegies of Anander, Anetor, and Muridella. By William Bas.
titleStmt.author: Basse, William, d. ca. 1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by V[alentine] S[immes] for I. B[arnes] and are to be sold at his shop in Fleet-street, at the signe of the great Turkes head,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Running title reads: Bas his elegies.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
